title: Nondeterministic Space Hierarchy Strictness - THE SEVENTH BREAKTHROUGH
main_results: Complete NSPACE hierarchy with explicit witnesses
Parallel structure to deterministic space hierarchy
significance: SEVENTH BREAKTHROUGH - Complete space picture established
key_insights: Nondeterministic space hierarchy mirrors deterministic - same log-factor gaps
At EACH level, det < nondet (nondeterminism helps)
At POLY level, NPSPACE = PSPACE (Savitch collapse)
Hierarchy STRUCTURE is identical in both modes
All four resource-mode combinations now have strict hierarchies

theorems.cc_nspace_equivalence: CC-NSPACE[s] = NSPACE[s] for all s >= log n
theorems.nspace_hierarchy: NSPACE(s) < NSPACE(s * log n) for all s >= log n

complete_hierarchy: NSPACE(log n) = NL < NSPACE(log n * log log n) < NSPACE(log^2 n) < ... < NPSPACE
All containments STRICT with explicit witnesses
connection_to_savitch: At polynomial level, NPSPACE = PSPACE (collapse occurs)
seven_breakthroughs: Phase 61: L != NL (nondeterminism helps in log space)
